select count(*) from event where event_end_date < sysdate

select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from event e inner join user_table u on e.user_seq=u.user_seq order by e.event_end_date asc) a ) where rnum>=1 and rnum<=10 and event_end_date > sysdate

select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from event e inner join user_table u on e.user_seq=u.user_seq order by e.event_end_date asc) a ) where rnum>=1 and rnum<=10 and event_end_date < sysdate

select * from event where event_no = (select prevDto from (select event_no,lead(event_no,1,-1)over(order by event_end_date asc)as prevDto from event where event_end_date > sysdate) where event_no = #{event_no})

SELECT * FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_NO = (SELECT prevDto FROM (SELECT EVENT_NO, LAG(EVENT_NO, 1, -1) OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_END_DATE ASC) AS prevDto FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_END_DATE > SYSDATE) WHERE EVENT_NO = #{event_no})
